thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Penske Automotive Group Reports Q4 EPS of $3.85 From Continuing Operations

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Penske Automotive Group Reports Q4 EPS of $3.85 From Continuing Operations
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Penske Automotive Group Inc:
* PENSKE AUTOMOTIVE REPORTS RECORD FOURTH QUARTER RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.85 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.01 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.85 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 10.4 PERCENT TO $5.4 BILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.00, REVENUE VIEW $5.28 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* PENSKE AUTOMOTIVE - QTRLY RESULTS INCLUDED $243.4 MILLION BENEFIT RELATED TO U.S. TAX REFORM Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
